text:
Company Background:
Rice, Wright and Smith is a leading law firm specializing in regulatory compliance. With a reputation for excellence, we provide expert legal services to our clientele, ensuring they navigate complex regulatory landscapes seamlessly.

Job Type:
Full-time

Job Description:
We are seeking a Regulatory Compliance Agency Attorney who can bring her nurturing skills to our team. The ideal candidate will have a natural ability to nurture talent and create a supportive environment. She will work closely with clients, providing gentle and understanding guidance through regulatory challenges.

Responsibilities:
- Provide legal counsel and representation in regulatory compliance matters.
- Develop and implement compliance programs tailored to client needs.
- Conduct thorough research and analysis of regulatory changes.
- Collaborate with the team to nurture junior associates and support their professional growth.
- Maintain intimate connections with clients to understand their unique needs.

Qualifications and Experience:
- Juris Doctor (JD) degree from an accredited law school.
- Admission to the state bar.
- 3+ years of experience in regulatory compliance law.
- Exceptional nurturing skills and the ability to create a supportive work environment.
- Strong research, analytical, and communication skills.

Perks and Benefits:
- Competitive salary range of $80,000 to $120,000, based on experience and skills.
- Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance.
- Generous paid time off and parental leave policies.
- Professional development opportunities and mentorship programs.
- Inclusive and supportive work environment.
